alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Benton; Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tippah, southeastern Benton, northwestern Prentiss and western Alcorn Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ripley, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Gravestown, Theo, Falkner, Dumas, Kossuth, Murry, Hightown, Collinstown, Crumtown, Clarysville, Whitten Town and Peoples. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
